snippet.title: Facility 47 - Trailer
snippet.description:
Facility 47 is a new adventure game from Inertia Game Studios available for iOS, Android and Kindle.
Visit our facebook page to stay up to date with all the latest news and exclusive behind the scenes gossip!
http://www.facebook.com/facility47
